data.message: after relapse stop listening to eminem he needs to stop making tracks for the charts and get back to the underground raw eminem i mean ffs what was rap god all about was pure shit 👎👎

replies.message: Pour? Or do you mean poor? Please elaborate, all i see is poor spelling.
stop making tracks for the charts? that would mean they wouldnt be good? lol
Silvester Godfatherr Garcia their you go flower I've fixed it just for you its a shame I can't do the same for your face oh well 😀😀😂
That like asking Jay-Z to rhyme like he was still making Reasonable Doubt. You can't they grow they get old they go through things
"Their" should be "there". Haha their is used as possessive pronoun another one to fix XD

Have you listened to bad guy, phenomenal, beautiful pain, guts over fear and the warning? Should i keep going on or what? He grew up he won't rap about being broke or underground anymore because he isn't
Rap god was just a freestyle he made up while laying on his couch, lmao

Can't agree with you truly BUT Relapse and older are true gold man, No New one can take that place. His genre of writing is changed. He tries some Slim's verses or songs BUT NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO, he can't do that now. He's HAPPY

So basically what you're saying is you liked it better when his life was in complete turmoil and you think he should go back to a physically and emotionally abusive relationship while on potentially fatal amounts of drugs in a spiraling depression for your selfish, ignorant benefit. What a great fan.
Yeah he should talk about killing faggots, killing women and self destruction again, new shit is boring
This summer on holiday with Eminem

All the man does is rap! What does he have to prove to anyone? In rap god he covers many different styles. Just enjoy his rhymes & lyrics. Just cause he doesn't make club bangers people want to say his raps suck
Let's put it this way, Em could rap about a fuckin turd, and it would still be dope as hell, lmao.
Obviously didn't listen too MMLP2
I liked Rap God
You should compare his songs with other rappers he rap from his heart and you can find the feelings all his songs is the developement of his ideas
Rap God was A freestyle...freestyles don't really mean anything just shit you think of on the spot
Listen to bad meets evil
Rap God was his way of showing off
You're just a listener not a fan lol😂
I was wandering how much of a retard you were. Then i saw you had Mcgregnut as your profile pic. Now i know you're not to be taken serious
yeah im the retard you have a face like a kneecap mate 😂😂😂
pretty fly for a white guy 😂😂
